6d2111b5-59c7-596d-855a-4040fe9f5f5d.title: Acceptance Criteria: Approved WTMP and MOA

5e555aa2-710c-5fd0-aa89-12f160075588.title: Record of conformity: Approved Mix Design

d0eb8f50-0e69-5960-bdfb-a80418b6aecb.title: Concrete mix designs shall remain valid for 12 months from the date of registration, unless constituent materials and material proportions cease to comply with the specified requirements.

a1413e7b-bf6b-5d1a-bc48-ef8ca8fb42f7.title: Frequency: No less than 4 weeks prior to commencement of activity

2ab2da3e-7720-5298-9892-d89856d8401c.title: Acceptance Criteria: The concrete mix design details shall be submitted for review by the Superintendent not less than 4 weeks prior to the placement of concrete. Concrete shall not be placed until the mix design has been reviewed by the Superintendent, and allocated a registration number on the Register of VicRoads approved concrete mixes.

bf310730-df96-535e-aa90-0835b351663e.title: Allocated registration number on the Register of VicRoads approved concrete mixes.

c6d6ca77-217b-5826-92b5-defe9d91643b.title: Record of conformity: Submitted Product Details

4dcd5564-cf77-538d-8345-7a8b95632ae7.title: Manufacturer of steel reinforcement materials must be in possession of a current certificate of approval, issued by the Australian Certification Authority for Reinforcing Steel (ACRS). Evidence of compliance with this clause shall be submitted to the superintendent within 14 days of award of the contract.

81d48fa5-2b88-504c-af48-47f1bcc8a8c8.title: Frequency: Prior to commencing works and no more than 14 days after contract award

5db8d2a5-4891-51d5-9c6d-27b0832d9255.title: Acceptance Criteria: Steel reinforcement shall comply with the requirements of Section 611. Unless otherwise shown on drawings, bars shall be grade 500N. Allowances should be made when preparing the steel reinforcement schedule to achieve the specified tolerances on member dimensions, concrete cover and location of steel reinforcement

13176dba-a335-5c3f-82fd-ce8f1782cad3.title: Record of conformity: Approval of Quality Procedure for piles construction

bc60410e-f7fb-5c56-9622-247dc20365cd.title: Reinforcement and/or concrete shall not be placed until the proposed method of removing mud, loose rock or similar materials, and the method of placement of concrete under water has been reviewed by the Superintendent.

94e3c9d1-9bb6-5640-bd7f-276d07c950d2.title: Acceptance Criteria: A quality procedure for the construction of the piles shall be submitted to the Superintendent not less than 4 weeks prior to the commencement of the piling works. Piling works shall not take place until the quality procedure has been reviewed and approved by the Superintendent.

6d9db5ca-7fef-5602-97f8-a7439b498bda.title: Frequency: No less than 4 weeks prior to commencement of activity

3182816d-30fd-58e1-ad38-620362f2818f.title: The Contractor shall submit the procedure for placing concrete in bored piles, under water and in dry bores, for review by the Superintendent at least four weeks prior to concreting.

8cf23bd3-8ef7-5778-b687-80eadbd29d4b.title: Concrete shall not be placed in bored piles, under water or in a dry bore until the proposed method of placement of concrete has been approved by the Superintendent.

627d1d3e-3991-5cc9-9119-5304f53a262d.title: Acceptance Criteria: Survey to ensure and validate that all works meet level and location requirements. Review of existing survey control marks and any additional control marks required for the works. The establishment and integrity of the survey network shall be verified before commencing any survey and set out activity.

77b5d714-f25c-55a8-9361-2ae0821f505f.title: Record of conformity: This ITP Signed, Survey Records

585e53bf-d6cf-51a0-966f-0bc2753603f2.title: Acceptance Criteria: No pile shall be commenced within 2.5m clear distance of a newly cast pile until the concrete in the pile has attained a strength of 15MPa

2a285b6b-718d-5312-b363-81db70220d8e.title: Record of conformity: This ITP Signed, Bored Pile Checklist

0358aed2-0f08-5d1e-82b3-3ff251f1ae17.title: Acceptance Criteria: Check the toe levels conform to the drawing.

66c36dc8-bb4e-5155-a5fd-adcd7abcb093.title: Record of conformity: Bored Pile Checklist CRG-FH-CL-0006

5548f3e2-744c-5ae2-99f6-f32c416376be.title: Frequency: Each Pile, a minimum of 48 hrs notice given to the Superintendent for arrangement of the inspection of the pile excavation

14a80049-2464-55c4-bfba-f69f629b228c.title: Record of conformity: Pile walls and base inspected by Superintendent, This ITP signed off

bbebba33-eccc-5f3f-85df-745fe908ba3f.title: Acceptance Criteria: The temporary casing (where used) shall not be removed, nor shall reinforcement and/or concrete be placed until the pile walls and base have been inspected by the Superintendent and that the inspection has confirmed that the geotechnical strength of the materials in the pile wall base have satisfied the design assumptions.

24ce41d0-8ca8-5aa9-804b-f3533fcb0fc7.title: Record of conformity: Bored Pile Checklist CRU-FH-CL-0006

1996e09e-dc20-52b9-89e5-2e5eea4c27a1.title: Reinforcement as per drawings and specification.

cb2a9e7c-fee3-5ab3-812f-8ac2f6db6a25.title: Acceptance Criteria: Steel Reinforcement shall be securely held during placing and compacting of concrete. Steel reinforcements shall be made of concrete blocks of a strength similar to the structure, strong enough to withstand the imposed loads without movement of the steel reinforcement. No other materials to be used as supports.

2fb834e4-8b37-5ea1-9b04-58f6eb73b1e3.title: Spacers and supports for bored pile steel reinforcement shall be placed at intervals of no more than 2 m along the full length of the steel reinforcement cage to ensure that the specified concrete cover to the steel reinforcement is maintained.

e4ab732c-7532-5dc8-b9ac-40d9fe2563eb.title: Acceptance Criteria: Bored Pile Checklist completed and signed.

e674446c-42cb-52b4-b256-0d9db6eeee4e.title: Record of conformity: Bored Pile Checklist CRG-FH-CL-0006

4095df0c-5758-5669-a685-42f265dfb298.title: – Number of samples taken shall be as per Table 610.161

305553c7-a32b-56b0-868a-7e27d3904698.title: Inspection / Test Method: Site Inspection, Site Sampling

bb83c579-823e-5202-b4f3-b7fe6c787b4b.title: – Three cylinders taken from the same sample used to test. 1 cylinder crushed at 7 days. 2 cylinders crushed at 28 days

ded98c3c-511d-5083-a85b-e74465a4be3c.title: T500 time: Achieve a spread of 500 mm within 1 to 5 seconds

b36b6365-ea46-5607-9724-67d5aff5c830.title: Observations as per Table 610.131 of VicRoads Spec.

c5ddccac-c9ac-5d08-8762-aa10dce3af30.title: Record of conformity: Concrete Pour Record CRG-FH-CL-0003 and Bored Pile Checklist CRG-FH-CL-0006 completed

aa0c1d94-59f3-50f4-9421-521b696f43a9.title: Record of conformity: Concrete Pour Record, Bored Pile Checklist, Concrete dockets

b78a06b7-e4c5-5804-bb85-4997063309a9.title: All concrete to be placed within 60 minutes from batch or as specified in the approved VR mix.

8585dba2-55a1-5a20-afc3-b9851a8acd6f.title: Discharge time between truckloads for the same cast to be <45 mins.

63859496-24e9-548d-bb5e-1a4290994ddf.title: Each batch (truckload) of concrete delivered to site shall be visually inspected to ensure consistency of concrete supply, and the estimated slump shall be recorded on the identification certificate for the batch.

e4b03a05-2dae-573e-bfce-ccf06426676f.title: Acceptance Criteria: Piles shall be concreted within 24 hours of completion of the pile excavation.

6567d074-eec6-5372-9140-43de86e45a8a.title: Piles places in the dry shall be constructed to a minimum of 300mm above pile cut-off level to allow breaking back of contaminated concrete at the top of the pile.

fc49c334-d8d1-5c0f-91f1-611dc89597d0.title: (C) Dynamic Load Testing - 1 in 10 Piles with a pile depth within 2m.

3d12958e-bccd-5536-a373-ad8848d22fd2.title: Acceptance Criteria: Unless dispensation is granted, a representative sample of piles shall be tested by a consultant prequalified to VicRoads as per the requirements of Section 606.07 including:

620e71a0-fef5-593e-944c-a24fc0a4a588.title: Record of conformity: Test reports provided to Superintendent, This ITP signed off

dc982088-e938-55ae-8480-b0aaef50b4b3.title: (A) Integrity Testing - First 6 piles constructed, then 1 in 3 remaining.

0ecf15d0-2843-5db5-90d0-ee7680ee5fda.title: Results including raw data are to be provided to the superintendent per the timeframes requested but no less than 48 hours after collection of results.

87d97c1a-fe27-5d4b-98c7-e63b1f23aecc.title: Frequency: Representative Sample determined in consultation with the Superintendent.

50ef63c5-8788-5eb6-aac1-f698f11fa252.title: Record of conformity: Compressive Strength (MPa) Test report, This ITP signed off

35c47197-b617-5b97-aa78-1edb1798ab95.title: Acceptance Criteria: Minimum 7 day strength (26MPa) achieved as per table 610.051

5f6be557-fbb9-5bde-b509-7ee13f453171.title: Inspection / Test Method: Site Inspection/ Document review

1f326e49-9e6e-567e-a4d6-5860ed5a23b0.title: Acceptance Criteria: Check Tolerances & Survey Pile positions:

092921c2-1733-5d7b-b305-6d0082a4e77b.title: (a) pile head shall finish within 75 mm of the specified plan position;

96f70e55-f787-5f5c-843a-4eaf47db16b5.title: (b) variation from the vertical or the specified batter/rake shall not be more than 1 in 100;

a2d9667b-1829-5460-ae35-c1b3206c4407.title: Mark all details correctly on as-builts

04a2b0dd-b6db-58a4-a58a-f982ab83f278.title: (c) where piling excavation has developed a curve or out of verticality, the offset from the theoretical straight pile line shall not exceed 150 mm over a length of 15 metres or proportionally for greater or shorter lengths.
